revised_title: Investigation of the Cœlomic Fluid of Lumbricus Terrestris and its Protective Mechanism
tldr: The study investigates the coelomic fluid of Lumbricus terrestris, focusing on its cellular contents, amoeboid cells, and symbiotic microorganisms. The research reveals the fluid's physical and chemical properties, as well as its role in a protective mechanism involving the earthworm's skin, dorsal pores, and coelomic fluid.
